Equipment Actions.Action 1: Claws, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 9 Slashing
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Trident, Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack, Range: 20/60ft, Average Damage: 7 Piercing

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Mezzoloth makes 2 attacks, one with its Claws and one with its Trident
Other Actions.Action 2: Teleport, The Mezzoloth magically teleports to an unoccupied space it can see

Abilities.Ability 1: Innate Spellcasting, The Mezzoloth can innately cast a few spells
Abilities.Ability 2: Magic Resistance, The Mezzoloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects
Abilities.Ability 3: Magic Weapons, The Mezzoloth's weapons attacks are magical

Damage Resistances.Damage 4: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks
